column2: The tablet for the section ahead is not available, the Station Master will see

i) 
The Starting and Advanced Starting Signals (where provided) are kept

ii)  
The  Home  Signal  (or  Outer  Home  Signal,  where  provided)  and  the

Distant  Signal 
(where  provided)  are  also  kept  at  “Danger”  and
“Caution” respectively until the train has been brought under control
at the Home Signal (or Outer Home Signal, where provided).
